item.title: All scripts I make just happen once
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

//if(FindColor(x,y,7829367, 580, 290, 619, 306))then; //tried FindColour to stop the co-ord from messing up…
ClickMouse(821, 402, True); //clicks in the ‘footmen’ training box
//SendKeys(‘13’) //types 13 into the training box

That there is your probelem

Take the //'s out at the start. Its not complying them because it thinks its comments

item.title: All scripts I make just happen once

item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

ActivateClient; opens client window on its own :).

Also, put the repeat in the train procedure, then only call it once.

item.title: All scripts I make just happen once
item.dc:creator: @Alon Alon
item.description:
@Alon wrote:

I didn’t write this but this is the reason that I found this site in the first place =) So can someone help me figure out what is wrong with this code? It does what its supposed to do it just doesn’t repeat itself…

[scar]

///
// Dreaded’s ZeldereX Unit Trainer

//
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///

                             //Setup//

//Go into training, make sure you’ve scrolled to the very top of the page,
//and move the Scar window away from the train footmen number input,
//then let her go!

program DZXUT;
//var x,y: integer;

procedure Train;
begin
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(821, 402, True); //clicks into the ZeldereX window (will change this so it does it itself when I know how to)
//if(FindColor(x,y,7829367, 580, 290, 619, 306))then; //tried FindColour to stop the co-ord from messing up…
ClickMouse(821, 402, True); //clicks in the ‘footmen’ training box
//SendKeys(‘13’) //types 13 into the training box
wait(1000);
HoldMouse(1142, 700, True); //scrolls down using the bottom arrow on the scroll bar
wait(1500);
ReleaseMouse(1142, 699, True); //stops scrolling down
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(244, 422, True); //selects offensive (so the troops will become defensive
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(258, 481, True); //clicks Train/Hire
ClickMouse(950, 35, True);
wait(150000) //waits 2.5 minutes then clicks Training to refresh
ClickMouse(960, 386, True);
wait(150000) //waits 2.5 minutes then clicks Training to refresh
ClickMouse(960, 386, True);
wait(150000) //waits 2.5 minutes then clicks Training to refresh
ClickMouse(960, 386, True);
wait(150000) //waits 2.5 minutes then clicks Training to refresh
ClickMouse(960, 386, True);
wait(10000);
end;
begin
repeat
Train;
until(false);
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
